channel.title: How to run my server 24/7
channel.description: I am trying to figure out how to run my server 24/7 i wasnt sure if i go to NO-IP and get a host for it or what. please some one answer this for me?

item.title: How to run my server 24/7
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Owner Mich, post:3, topic:425790”][quote author=youridudock link=topic=528454.msg3853900#msg3853900 date=1324230847]
Portforward and then keep your computer running the server on 24-7.

(Or just buy a vps)
[/quote]How much would a Vps cost and is it a monthly payment?[/quote]cheap ones from vpsland can run around $20

I would suggest a better company though…such as kickassvps for around $30-$35

these are monthly plans, generally speaking the yearly plans are good discounts.

Read full topic
